txt.en: 'Marvelously done, [placeholder]! Marvelously done indeed. Might I...have a sip of that beer? If you are willing to share, I shall give you a grand gift.'
'Have you collected the glorious beer yet? I shall not respect you until you do!'
The Mightiest Blow
Now you should slot your club as a skill -- the fight will begin soon
'Now that you wield the mighty dwarf-club, you should enter the fight-arena and claim your prize! Stop at nothing, [placeholder]; do not let them deter you from your charge!'
You did not enter the fight-arena in time
'Now that you have wielded the mighty dwarf-club, you should enter the battle area and claim your prize! Stop at nothing, [placeholder]; do not let them deter you from your charge!'
The fight has begun! You may begin swinging

The fight-arena is the lowered floorspace in the centre of the hall, marked by green banners. The dwarf-club is in your inventory.

Gísli Strongclub has given you an excellent weapon with which to defend your prize. You should enter the fight-arena below while wielding your mighty dwarf-club.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the fight-arena after entering, you will drop your club. The club may not be used outside of the fight-arena's bounds.</rgb>
You have left the fight-arena. You may try again in 10 minutes, when the next round begins

The fight-arena's bounds are in the centre of the ale-hall at Thorin's Hall, marked by green banners.

You should wait for the fight to begin.

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: If you leave the arena's bounds after entering, you will drop your mighty dwarf-club. The dwarf-club cannot be used outside of the arena's bounds.</rgb>
You have collected the glorious beer

Greedy people in the lowered fight-arena wish to steal the glorious beer.\n\nGive the greedy folks around you a few good whacks for their impertinence! You must now do whatever it takes to collect the glorious beer for yourself, but beware: if you leave the fight-arena for any reason, you will be disqualified.
Knocked greedy competitors out of the way ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gísli Strongclub is in the arena at Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should speak with Gísli Strongclub to boast of your excellence in collecting the glorious beer.
You have dropped your mighty dwarf-club in the shock of shame and defeat
Gísli Strongclub is in the arena at Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should speak with Gísli Strongclub to boast of your excellence in collecting the glorious beer.
This round has ended; you were unable to best your fellows in time
Time has run out
Enter the fight-arena before the fight begins. Do not leave the bounds
Slot the dwarf-club in your skills and wait for the fight to begin
Do not leave the fight-arena's bounds
Collect the glorious beer before the others get the last of it
Give greedy fellow players a whack for good measure ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Do not leave the fight-arena
Talk to Gísli Strongclub before the time expires
Talk to Gísli Strongclub
The time has run out
This round has ended; you were unable to collect the beer in time
You have been challenged to collect the most glorious beer in Middle-earth, the prize of the celebration in Thorin's Hall this.

'Greetings, patron! This is a fine place for a brawl, don't you think? I happen to know that the most glorious beer in all of Middle-earth, pride of the Inn League, will be available to he who is lucky enough to lay his hands upon it first. The trick is to best all others who covet this brew -- and I expect there will be many. No beer in the world is as golden, deep, or mellow. It is smooth, dark, and frothy; it chills the tongue and warms the heart.

'If you wish to stand a chance at all, you should wield a mighty dwarf-club and keep the others away. Make sure you are ready to fight before you enter the hall! If you leave the bounds of that lower level yonder, you will be immediately disqualified. Good luck to you, [placeholder]!'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The mighty dwarf-club will appear in your inventory. You should quickslot it to participate in the fight. This item cannot be used outside of the fight-arena's bounds.</rgb>
